page.title: 18FARMING
page.content: In our area we sent off 23 questionnaires to farms we received 14 replies.The largest farm is 261 acres the smallest is 5 acres. Most farms only have 1'2or3 workers. None of the farms had any pigs at all, 14 farms had cattle and 8 farms have sheep. 3 farms have horses and 6 farms have ducks. Of the 14 farms 11 are mixed farms. A{mixed farm}is a farm with all sorts of farm animals and crops. Of all the 14 farms 1 of them is a dairy farm and 1 riding school and 1 market garden. The farm we visited was a{dairy}farm and he had 102 cows that day and they produced 1671 litres of milk a day. A large lorry comes to get the milk and takes it to the Four Crosses Dairy. The cows are milked in a herring bone parlour.In the winter they eat silage and nuts. All the cows are friesians
